title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Associate Post
description: Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has officially released the notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in M.E/ M.Tech. in Mechanical EngineeringÂ can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates...
